verses.verse: Michtam <WH4387> of David. <WH1732> Preserve <WH8104> me, O God: <WH410> for in you do I put my trust. <WH2620>
O my soul, you have said <WH559> to the LORD, <WH3068> You are my Lord: <WH136> my goodness <WH2896> extends not to you;
But to the saints <WH6918> that are in the earth, <WH776> and to the excellent, <WH117> in whom is all <WH3605> my delight. <WH2656>

Their sorrows <WH6094> shall be multiplied <WH7235> that hasten <WH4116> after another <WH312> god: their drink <WH5262> offerings of blood <WH1818> will I not offer, <WH5258> nor <WH1077> take <WH5375> up their names <WH8034> into <WH5921> my lips. <WH8193>
The LORD <WH3068> is the portion <WH4490> of my inheritance <WH2506> and of my cup: <WH3563> you maintain <WH8551> my lot. <WH1486>
The lines <WH2256> are fallen <WH5307> to me in pleasant <WH5273> places; yes, <WH637> I have <WH5921> a goodly <WH8231> heritage. <WH5159>
I will bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> who <WH834> has given me counsel: <WH3289> my reins <WH3629> also <WH637> instruct <WH3256> me in the night <WH3915> seasons.
I have set <WH7737> the LORD <WH3068> always <WH8548> before <WH5048> me: because <WH3588> he is at my right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> I shall not be moved. <WH4131>
Therefore <WH3651> my heart <WH3820> is glad, <WH8056> and my glory <WH3519> rejoices: <WH1523> my flesh <WH1320> also <WH637> shall rest <WH7931> in hope. <WH983>
For you will not leave <WH5800> my soul <WH5315> in hell; <WH7585> neither <WH3808> will you suffer <WH5414> your Holy <WH2623> One to see <WH7200> corruption. <WH7845>

You will show <WH3045> me the path <WH734> of life: <WH2416> in your presence <WH6440> is fullness <WH7648> of joy; <WH8057> at your right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> there are pleasures <WH5273> for ever more. <WH5331>
